data.name: 0000 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, I've been thinking…

data.name: 0001 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We were on the way to the staff room to borrow a key to the music room.

data.name: 0002 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I went with Asahina from club building, through the central building, to the main building.

data.name: 0003 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Um, Asahina.

data.name: 0004 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I could no longer hold back so I opened my mouth.

data.name: 0005 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Wh-what is it?

data.name: 0006 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, it's just my arm…

data.name: 0007 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh...?

data.name: 0008 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I know it must seem an enviable situation from the outside…

data.name: 0009 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Either way, I'm not used to it, so I'm honestly pretty embarrassed.

data.name: 0010 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-um, I'm sorry.

data.name: 0011 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No, it's not a problem…

data.name: 0012 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I just don't know when a ghost or unnatural phenomenon might appear, so...

data.name: 0013 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I'm scared…

data.name: 0014 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's hard to blame her when even Nagato's saying she doesn't know what'll happen.

data.name: 0015 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I suppose I have no choice but to endure this delightful torture.

data.name: 0017 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, I was wondering…

data.name: 0018 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about we tell Haruhi we asked the teacher...

data.name: 0019 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...but they wouldn't give us the key?

data.name: 0020 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hmm... Well we are dealing with Suzumiya, so I feel like if we say something like that...

data.name: 0021 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ...she'll just say she'll go get it herself, right?

data.name: 0022 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …That wouldn't surprise me.

data.name: 0023 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's honestly so plausible it makes me want to cry.

data.name: 0024 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hah... In the end I suppose we have no choice but to make a sincere effort to get the key…

data.name: 0026 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, we arrived at the staff room.

data.name: 0027 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Honestly, I'm not a huge fan of the atmosphere of the staff room.

data.name: 0028 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Honestly, me neither…

data.name: 0029 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How should we go about asking for the key?

data.name: 0030 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no doubt that if we can't get it, it'll only worsen Haruhi's mood.

data.name: 0031 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wanna do whatever I can to avoid that.

data.name: 0032 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With that in mind, the answer I suggested was…

data.name: 0033 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm gonna go straight in by myself, so you can just wait here.

data.name: 0034 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eh... Are you sure?

data.name: 0035 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Leave it to me. See you in a bit.

data.name: 0037 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Excuse me, I'd like to borrow the key for the music room.

data.name: 0038 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: The music room? You have business in there?

data.name: 0039 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, well... research, or rather part of club activities…

data.name: 0040 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Alright, well fill in your business on this sheet then hand it back to me.

data.name: 0041 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sheet...? A room lending application document, huh.

data.name: 0042 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No problem. If this is all I need to do I could do it all day…

data.name: 0043 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Club name and reason of use... I'm not sure how to put it.

data.name: 0044 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no way I can naively put "SOS Brigade. Objective: Ghost hunting."

data.name: 0045 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I wrote that, I wouldn't be able to borrow anything.

data.name: 0046 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Club name is "Literature Club."

data.name: 0047 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Purpose... Oh what do I care? I'm giving in to despair. For "Literature club band" practice.

data.name: 0048 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I've filled it in. Here.

data.name: 0049 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Literature club... band? ...Ah, whatever.

data.name: 0050 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Make sure to put it back to how it was once you've done with the place.

data.name: 0051 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yep, thank you very much.

data.name: 0052 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He definitely seemed to be suspicious of me… though for the time being that's a success.

data.name: 0053 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I should return with Asahina to our meeting point .

data.name: 0054 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Excuse me, Asahina, but do you mind if you go?

data.name: 0055 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eh, b-by... myself?

data.name: 0056 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I feel like you'll give a far better impression without me coming with you.

data.name: 0057 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I hope you don't mind just for this once.

data.name: 0058 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeek... Okay... U-understood... Don't leave though, right Kyon?

data.name: 0059 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't worry, I'll be waiting here for you.

data.name: 0060 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's a promise, right...? Then, I'll be back in a bit.

data.name: 0061 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina headed into the staff room with an anxious look on her face.

data.name: 0062 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, I guess I'll just kill time until Asahina returns.

data.name: 0064 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …She's taking a while, huh.

data.name: 0065 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There're no two ways about it, she's taking way too long!

data.name: 0066 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Surely there wasn't some kind of problem, right? ...I guess I should check on her.

data.name: 0067 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Excuse me... Huh, Asahina, what are you doing?

data.name: 0068 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, Kyon.

data.name: 0069 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I was just preparing tea for Okabe.

data.name: 0070 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I can see that much.

data.name: 0071 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What I really mean is, why are you doing such a thing?

data.name: 0072 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-sorry... It just sort of happened.

data.name: 0073 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Then, I'll be borrowing the key now, okay?

data.name: 0074 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Yeah, just make sure you put it back how it was once you're done.

data.name: 0075 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, thank you very much.

data.name: 0076 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Oh, right, wait a moment.

data.name: 0077 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes?

data.name: 0078 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is there something wrong?

data.name: 0079 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: No, not at all. I've got these taking up space, so you can take them.

data.name: 0080 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Sweets?

data.name: 0081 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Just thanks for making me tea.

data.name: 0082 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Th-thank you very much--

data.name: 0083 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-sorry, Kyon, for making you wait so long…

data.name: 0084 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …So why exactly were you making tea for Okabe?

data.name: 0085 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, well... He looked busy and I just ended up doing it...

data.name: 0086 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, thanks to that you left a good impression on Okabe.

data.name: 0087 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And you got teacakes while you were at it, so it all worked out in the end.

data.name: 0088 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well then... Shall we head back to the meeting point?

data.name: 0089 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's no point turning up late and ruining Haruhi's mood any further after all.

data.name: 0090 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, we've come this far together, so let's go in together, shall we?

data.name: 0091 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's right. I can relax if I go with you, Kyon.

data.name: 0092 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hearing her talk like that, I feel like if anything happens I'd better protect her.

data.name: 0093 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Leave it to me. Shall we head in then?

data.name: 0095 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Excuse me, we'd like to borrow the key for the music room.

data.name: 0096 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: Hm? ...That's fine--is it for a club or something?

data.name: 0097 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Y-yes. Umm, it's…

data.name: 0098 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Something within me told me he wouldn't like us announcing ourselves as the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0099 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Th-the literature club. Yes, we need it as the literature club.

data.name: 0100 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato, I hope you don't mind me borrowing the name of your club.

data.name: 0101 (408.ja) OKABE (岡部)
data.value: The literature club in the music room? ...Well, whatever, but you need to fill out this form.

data.name: 0102 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Form, form... This, right?

data.name: 0103 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Club name: Literature Club Representative: Yuki Nagato

data.name: 0104 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Reason... Ah whatever, I'll just make something up…

data.name: 0105 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: "Literature club band" practice, that should do.

data.name: 0106 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, I've finished writing... Huh?

data.name: 0107 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When I looked up, Asahina was on the other side preparing tea for Okabe.

data.name: 0108 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What on earth is she doing?

data.name: 0109 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, I'm done.

data.name: 0110 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, okay--! Well, if you'll excuse me--!

data.name: 0111 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina rushed over to me and bowed her head a few times.

data.name: 0112 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm sorry, he said he wanted tea, so I just…

data.name: 0113 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I was busy filling in this document while you were at it, so it's absolutely fine.

data.name: 0114 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We exchanged the sheet for the key and put the staff room behind us.

data.name: 0115 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? Asahina, what's that bag?

data.name: 0116 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Okabe had these teacakes he didn't need, so he gave them to me as thanks.

data.name: 0117 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We might be able to use those to get Haruhi's attention…

data.name: 0118 (408.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nah, there's no way. She's not a child or animal or anything.

data.name: 0119 (408.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So should we head back to the meeting point then? It'll be a pain if we make Haruhi wait.

data.name: 0120 (408.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehehe, that's right.

data.name: 0121 (408.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Go by yourself

data.name: 0122 (408.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Leave it to Asahina

data.name: 0123 (408.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Go together
